name: Cratest Jump
description:
Description

In a dark, desolate, and distant future, one crate hopes to make it to the top of the world. Can you become the cratest of all time?

How To Play

- Click and drag anywhere on the screen to sling-shot the crate up the platforms.

- Earn points by landing on the next platform.

- Earn bonus points by doing a rotation before landing!

*Will be available on the Play Store very soon!*
